Make your project & tasks well planned

Build your own workspace to replace isolated tools and bring everyone together.

Keep your work bundled together.

Each item in your database is its own page. Keep all related work in one spot.

Real-time collaboration

Work on the same page at the same time with as many teammates as you want.

Track your task

Add a filter to see only your tasks. Easily toggle between tasks for you and tasks for the whole team.

A Plan to succeed at scale

Oval can help your team collaborate easily. So you will have more control and more support to run your company to work with your team.

Dedicated success manager

Your own customer success manager to help onboard large teams and create custom workflows.

Advanced permissions

Extra permission controls to prevent certain employees from sharing pages externally, disable guests and etc.

Custom contracting

We’ll work with you to create a custom contract and payment via PO/invoice.

Unlimited version history

Access version history of any page indefinitely, not just only 30 days like other products.

Early access

You’ll always have the most powerful version of Notion. You’ll also influence our future product roadmap.

Bulk PDF export

Export all of your content at once as PDFs. Handy for legal or compliance backups.
